NOTE: Pro forma results for the first quarter of 1997 assume the initial public offering occurred January 1, 1996
The company completed its initial public offering on February 12, 1997.
Pro forma results for the first quarter of 1996 assumes the formation transaction had occurred January 1, 1996.
Revenues for the first quarter of 1996 did not include two courses opened in June and August 1996. Had they been in
existence for the quarter, revenue would have been increased by $929,000.
The company was not available to comment on its net income for either quarter.
